message: I've created a little site to keep track of activities. I know the design is hideous!   Please let me know your feedback.  Best Always, Mike
it doesn't even have a valid html. you don't seem to care about it, why should anyone?
You need a new user interface.  Your website looks like a scam website
I think people won't read the first paragraph because its big and there are many keywords.
yeah... at least use a free template. there are sites that provide free templates for commercial use out there...
I suggest you use CSS instead of tables for layouting.

I see you are doing this with as little investment as possible. I understand why but would encourage you to spend on design. It just doesn't look professional so regardless of other things I don't think it will make it as is.
definately more work on the design...  I use a similiar site called toggl for tracking my work habits...the timer function works really well for me
We do UI design if you're interested: http://kreativehq.com
i would think this is a trap. facebook connect is implemented, but no design? domain name sounds ok actually
go to themeforest and get a cheap theme. besides design it's an interesting website. you can even put filter, tags, more options to filter the info.
This site--and the feedback--make me think the world is ready for Pimp My Webapp
Thanks for all of the feedback here. I really do appreciate it!
